page.title: 17Living at Fox Lodge (2)
page.content: Mrs.Kay says that the people in the community tend to use the village shop only for small purchases.It can offer only a very limited range of groceries and these tend to be expensive. Since everyone has access to a car,they much prefer to make the journey into Northampton for food and supplies. In winter, when the area has few visitors, Mrs.Kay enjoys a walk along the deserted reservoir bank. She recalled the recent{protests}from local people when the water authority proposed to create a leisure park and cycle track around Pitsford Water. She is pleased that the villagers were successful in opposing the scheme. The area has such a{low population that a former neighbour was able to use the field next to his house as a landing strip for his privately owned light aircraft!
